name: SoreJump
description:
Do you like Trucks, Jumping, Parkour and Action? Then SoreJump is a game for you! SoreJump is a game where you jump from truck to truck to earn points. Tis game is at the moment only singleplayer but will maybe be multiplayer in the future. Join our discord for discounts

You pay 5$ to play early version, but it the full version will be free when it realeses (date unknown)
